name: mikroe.click.brushless25
short_description: Brushless 25 Click is a compact add-on board that controls brushless DC (three-phase BLDC) motors with any MCU. This board features the MCT8316A, a high-speed sensorless trapezoidal control integrated FET BLDC driver from Texas Instruments. It provides three individually controllable drivers intended to drive a three-phase BLDC motor, solenoids, or other loads.
